name: Fling Fighters 2
description:
-------

This is the post jam version of the game Fling Fighters which was made within 48 for the GMTKJam 2020, based on the theme "out of control".

-------

Flight and build your armada of air fighters to overwhelm the opposing base.

Gather material from the destroyed constructions to upgrade your base and aircraft.

Scoring - Your score is based on how much resources you gather and how little energy you spend. The total score is shown in the end screen when three bases has been defeated.

Fighter ability - every fighter has an ability which can be used on space. Most of them has a lower energy cost if you retreat with the ability instead of getting destroid in battle.

Controls

  • Move - A & S
  • Launch fighter - Space
  • Fighter ability - Space
  • Management - Mouse & Left Click
